channel.title: ml on Tech Jaunts
channel.description: Recent content in ml on Tech Jaunts

item.title: Discrete Markov-chain in layman's terms: Part 1
item.description: Because of current technology advances, machine learning nowadays is able to make decision close to what human would make, on its own. It was birthed from pattern recognition and the belief that computers will teach without being programmed to accomplish particular tasks; researchers involved in artificial intelligence needed to think if computers would learn from data. This repetitive view of machine learning is crucial because as models are exposed to current information, they are able to independently change.

item.title: Get a data science job with no experience.
item.description: Data science is a very popular industry and it continues to grab the attention for a lot of people. You get to harness and quantify data, while also getting an amazing paycheck. That being said, getting into this field can be difficult. Which is why you want to target some entry level data science jobs at first. However, you need to make sure that you avoid any possible mistakes that might appear.
